channel.title: hiking on Pieter's Musings
channel.description: Recent content in hiking on Pieter's Musings

item.title: Kroonlandpiek
item.author: pieter@jordaan.me (Pieter Jordaan)
item.description: On a rare sunny winter’s day, 8 club members ventured into the hidden Elandskloof valley behind Villiersdorp.

item.title: Northern Cederberg Exploration
item.author: pieter@jordaan.me (Pieter Jordaan)
item.description: Eight adventurous souls embarked on a weekend hike in the Northern Cederberg, setting off early on a rainy Thursday the 27th April.

item.title: Hex Exploration
item.author: pieter@jordaan.me (Pieter Jordaan)
item.description: A party of five headed into the less frequented area of the Hex lying just to the east of Milner Peak.

item.title: Rabiesberg & Naudésberg
item.author: pieter@jordaan.me (Pieter Jordaan)
item.description: Tucked away in the north-western end of the Langeberg is a cluster of remote, high mountains known as the Kwadousberge. These include Keeromsberg (2071m) and the striking Saw Edge Peak (1723m). This weekend we would only tackle the ‘babies’ of the range, Rabiesberg (1663m) and Naudésberg (1644m).

item.title: Victoria Peak
item.author: pieter@jordaan.me (Pieter Jordaan)
item.description: Twenty-three sleepy souls met at the Jonkershoek Reserve Gate at 07h15, eager for a long and rewarding day in the mountains.
